name: Catch It Gargamel!
description:
Catch It Gargamel! A fun Game in Development paying homage to my Math Professor

" Has everyone understood what I just said? " - With these Words he unwillingly created a wave of pretty funny memes. Memes which lead to some funny comparisons with Gargamel. Which led to this:

After this was turned into a sweet little GIF showing Gargamel transforming into my Professor, I decided to up my game. It was time to strike back, AND DECLARE MY SUPERIORITY ONCE AND FOR ALL!

Sooo I created a little Game using Java, Its the most basic Game ever... for now!

In the future this will update with better Sprites and so on.

To fully immerse yourself into the Game, let the Main Music play for a while... Disclaimer: This Game was developed for Germans, therefor all Text and Music you hear is in German (besides the Main Music Track)

Assets belong to: Fellow Students, Royalty-free Websites, YouTube, Word Math Equations
